abstract: The focus of current research activities is on: (1) analyzing spectra from cloud-to-ground lightning and intracloud lightning; (2) site error analyses and sensitivity tests for direction finders in the East Coast network; (3) integration of lightning location data with satellite images on the Wisconsin McIDAS system; and (4) fundamental studies of the relation between meteorological parameters and characteristics of lightning determined by the SUNYA Lightning Detection Network.
title: Remote observations of severe storms

publications.publicationName: NASA. Marshall Space Flight Center NASA(MSFC FY-85 Atmospheric Processes Research Review
